mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE_NUM, CREATED_DATE, BIRTH, GENDER) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNum}, #{cDatetime}, #{birth}, #{gender})
INSERT INTO TBL_ADDRESS (ADDRESS_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, ZONECODE) VALUES (#{addressNo}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{addressDetail},#{zonecode})
